p: The flavone 15 revealed a similar fragmentation pathway of C-glycosylated flavonoid. So, fragment ions yielded from consecutive losses of 90 and 120 u suggested the C-hexosyl substituents, such as the ions at m/z 505 [M + H-90] +, 475 [M + H-120] +, and 355 [M + H-120-120] +. This compound was annotated as 6,8-di- C-hexosyl apigenin [ 31].
